tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_sensors (
 sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
 diagnostic_code INT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    code_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (code_id) REFERENCES diagnostic_codes(code_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    reading_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    code VARCHAR(50),
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);
